#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;


map <string,int> m;

int main () {

    int n,level = 1;
    cin >> n;

    string s;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin >> s;

        map<string,int>::iterator it = m.find(s);

        if(it==m.end()){
            m.insert(make_pair(s,1));
            if(level==1){
                cout << "1 " << s << endl;
                level ++;
            }

        } else {
            it->second++;
            if(level==it->second){
                cout << it->second << " " << it->first << endl;
                level++;
            }
        }



    }



    return 0;

}
